              def perform_parse(data, base_currency)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                begin
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  # Parse JSON
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  parsed_data = JSON.parse(data)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  raise ParseError, "Invalid JSON: #{e.message}"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                rates = []
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Get date from JSON or use today
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                date = extract_date(parsed_data['date'] || 
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                                    parsed_data['effectiveDate'] || 
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                                    parsed_data['effective_date'])
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                # Try to get base currency from JSON if provided
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                json_base = parsed_data['base'] || parsed_data['baseCurrency'] || parsed_data['base_currency']
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                base_currency = standardize_currency_code(json_base) if json_base
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                # Try different JSON formats
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                rates = try_rates_object_format(parsed_data, base_currency, date) ||
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                        try_rates_array_format(parsed_data, base_currency, date) ||
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                        try_direct_array_format(parsed_data, base_currency, date) ||
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                        try_direct_object_format(parsed_data, base_currency, date) ||
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                        []
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65.

                rates

              # Extract date from JSON data
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              # @param data [Hash] Parsed JSON data
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              # @return [Date, nil] Extracted date or nil if not found
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              def extract_date(data)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                date_str = data['date'] || data['effectiveDate'] || data['effective_date']
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                return nil unless date_str
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                begin
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  Date.parse(date_str.to_s)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                rescue
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                end

    83.

      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              # Parse rate value from various formats
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              # @param value [Object] Value to parse
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              # @return [Float] Parsed rate value
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

              def parse_rate_value(value)
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                if value.is_a?(Numeric)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  value.to_f
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                elsif value.is_a?(String)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  value.gsub(',', '.').to_f
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                elsif value.is_a?(Hash) && (value['value'] || value['rate'])
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  (value['value'] || value['rate']).to_f
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                else
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  0.0
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

              # Format 1: Object with currency codes as keys
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

              def try_rates_object_format(parsed_data, base_currency, date)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                return nil unless parsed_data['rates']&.is_a?(Hash)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                rates = []
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                parsed_data['rates'].each do |code, value|
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  currency_code = standardize_currency_code(code)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  # Skip invalid codes
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  next if currency_code.empty? || currency_code.length != 3
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  rate_value = parse_rate_value(value)
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  next if rate_value.zero?
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  rates << create_exchange_rate(base_currency, currency_code, rate_value, 1, date)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                rates.empty? ? nil : rates
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

              end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              # Format 2: Array of rate objects
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

              def try_rates_array_format(parsed_data, base_currency, date)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                return nil unless parsed_data['rates']&.is_a?(Array)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                rates = []
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                parsed_data['rates'].each do |rate_obj|
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  next unless rate_obj.is_a?(Hash)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  code = rate_obj['code'] || rate_obj['currency'] || rate_obj['currencyCode']
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  next unless code
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  currency_code = standardize_currency_code(code)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  # Skip invalid codes
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  next if currency_code.empty? || currency_code.length != 3
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  rate_value = parse_rate_value(rate_obj['rate'] || rate_obj['value'])
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  next if rate_value.zero?
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  amount = (rate_obj['amount'] || 1).to_i
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  rates << create_exchange_rate(base_currency, currency_code, rate_value, amount, date)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                rates.empty? ? nil : rates
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              
          
      147.

              # Format 3: Direct array of currency objects

              def try_direct_array_format(parsed_data, base_currency, date)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                return nil unless parsed_data.is_a?(Array)
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150.

    151. 
            

            

                rates = []

    152. 
            

            

                parsed_data.each do |rate_obj|

      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155.

      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157.

    158.

    160. 
            

            

                  # Skip invalid codes

    161. 
            

            

                  next if currency_code.empty? || currency_code.length != 3
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  rate_value = parse_rate_value(rate_obj['rate'] || rate_obj['value'])
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  next if rate_value.zero?
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  amount = (rate_obj['amount'] || 1).to_i
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  rates << create_exchange_rate(base_currency, currency_code, rate_value, amount, date)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170.

                rates.empty? ? nil : rates
          
      172.

      173.

              # Format 4: Direct object with currency codes as keys
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

              def try_direct_object_format(parsed_data, base_currency, date)
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                return nil unless parsed_data.is_a?(Hash)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                rates = []
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                parsed_data.each do |code, value|
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  # Skip non-currency fields
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  next if ['date', 'base', 'baseCurrency', 'base_currency'].include?(code)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  currency_code = standardize_currency_code(code)
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  # Skip invalid codes
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  next if currency_code.empty? || currency_code.length != 3
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                  rate_value = parse_rate_value(value)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  next if rate_value.zero?
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  rates << create_exchange_rate(base_currency, currency_code, rate_value, 1, date)
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193.

                rates.empty? ? nil : rates

    app/adapters/formats/txt_adapter.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    47 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 47 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            require_relative '../base/base_adapter'
          
      2.

            require_relative '../../services/utils/format_helper'
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            class TxtAdapter < BaseAdapter
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              CONTENT_TYPES = Utils::FormatHelper::ContentTypeDetection::TXT_CONTENT_TYPES
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              def supports_content_type?(content_type)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                Utils::FormatHelper::ContentTypeDetection.is_txt_content_type?(content_type)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              def supports_content?(content)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # If it's not XML or JSON, it's probably text
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                !Utils::FormatHelper::ContentTypeDetection.looks_like_xml?(content) &&
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                !Utils::FormatHelper::ContentTypeDetection.looks_like_json?(content) &&
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                content && !content.to_s.strip.empty?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              end
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              # Parse CNB-style TXT format data
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              # Format example:
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              # Date: 01.01.2023
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              # Country|Currency|Amount|Code|Rate
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              # Australia|dollar|1|AUD|15.123
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              # ...
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              def perform_parse(data, base_currency)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                lines = data.strip.split("\n")
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                # Skip empty lines
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                lines = lines.select { |line| !line.strip.empty? }
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                return [] if lines.empty?
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                # Try to extract date from the first line
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                date = extract_date(lines.first)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                # Skip header lines (typically 2 in CNB format)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                data_lines = lines[2..-1] || []
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                return [] if data_lines.empty?
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                # Parse each data line
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                rates = []
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                data_lines.each do |line|
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  # Normalize delimiters (could be |, tabs, or multiple spaces)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  normalized_line = line.strip.gsub(/\s+\|\s+|\t+|\s{2,}/, '|')
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  parts = normalized_line.split('|')
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  # Minimum expected parts: country, currency name, amount, code, rate
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  next if parts.length < 5
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  # Extract components (positions based on CNB format)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  country = parts[0].strip
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  currency_name = parts[1].strip
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  amount = parse_amount(parts[2], parts[3])
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  currency_code = standardize_currency_code(parts[3].strip)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  rate_value = parse_rate_value(parts[4])
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # Skip invalid codes
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  next if currency_code.empty? || currency_code.length != 3
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  # Create exchange rate object
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  rates << create_exchange_rate(base_currency, currency_code, rate_value, amount, date)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                rates
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              private
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              # Extract date from a string in various formats
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              # @param line [String] Line to extract date from
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              # @return [Date] Extracted date or today's date if not found
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              def extract_date(line)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                # Try to match DD.MM.YYYY format
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                if match = line.match(/(\d{1,2})\.(\d{1,2})\.(\d{4})/)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  day, month, year = match.captures
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  return Date.new(year.to_i, month.to_i, day.to_i)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                # Try to match YYYY-MM-DD format
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                if match = line.match(/(\d{4})-(\d{1,2})-(\d{1,2})/)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  year, month, day = match.captures
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  return Date.new(year.to_i, month.to_i, day.to_i)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                # Default to today if no date found
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                Date.today
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            end 
          
      88.

    app/adapters/formats/xml_adapter.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    77 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 77 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            require 'nokogiri'
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

            require_relative '../base/base_adapter'
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            require_relative '../../services/utils/format_helper'
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5.

            class XmlAdapter < BaseAdapter
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              CONTENT_TYPES = Utils::FormatHelper::ContentTypeDetection::XML_CONTENT_TYPES
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              def supports_content_type?(content_type)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                Utils::FormatHelper::ContentTypeDetection.is_xml_content_type?(content_type)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              end
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def supports_content?(content)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                Utils::FormatHelper::ContentTypeDetection.looks_like_xml?(content)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              end
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              # Parse XML exchange rate data
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              # Expected format:
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              # <exchangeRates date="YYYY-MM-DD">
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              #   <rate>
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              #     <code>USD</code>
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              #     <value>21.123</value>
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              #     <amount>1</amount>
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              #   </rate>
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              #   ...
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              # </exchangeRates>
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              # 
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              # Alternative format:
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              # <rates>
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              #   <currency code="USD" amount="1">21.123</currency>
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              #   ...
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              # </rates>
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              def perform_parse(data, base_currency)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                begin
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  # Parse XML with Nokogiri
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  doc = Nokogiri::XML(data) { |config| config.strict }
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  # Try to extract date
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  date_attr = doc.root['date']
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  date = date_attr ? extract_date(date_attr) : Date.today
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  raise ParseError, "Invalid XML: #{e.message}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                # Try different possible XML structures
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                rates = try_rate_elements_format(doc, base_currency, date) ||
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                        try_currency_elements_format(doc, base_currency, date) ||
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                        try_tag_as_currency_format(doc, base_currency, date) ||
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                        []
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                rates
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              private
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              # Format 1: <rate> elements with child elements
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              def try_rate_elements_format(doc, base_currency, date)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                rates = []
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                doc.css('rate').each do |rate_elem|
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    code_elem = rate_elem.at_css('code')
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    value_elem = rate_elem.at_css('value')
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    amount_elem = rate_elem.at_css('amount')
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                    next unless code_elem && value_elem
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    currency_code = standardize_currency_code(code_elem.text)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    rate_value = parse_rate_value(value_elem.text)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    amount = amount_elem ? amount_elem.text.to_i : 1
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    # Skip invalid codes
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    next if currency_code.empty? || currency_code.length != 3
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    # Create exchange rate object
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    rates << create_exchange_rate(base_currency, currency_code, rate_value, amount, date)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    # Skip elements with errors
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    next
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                rates.empty? ? nil : rates
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              # Format 2: <currency> elements with attributes
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              def try_currency_elements_format(doc, base_currency, date)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                rates = []
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                doc.css('currency').each do |currency_elem|
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    currency_code = standardize_currency_code(currency_elem['code'])
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    rate_value = parse_rate_value(currency_elem.text)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    amount = currency_elem['amount'] ? currency_elem['amount'].to_i : 1
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    # Skip invalid codes
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    next if currency_code.empty? || currency_code.length != 3
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    # Create exchange rate object
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    rates << create_exchange_rate(base_currency, currency_code, rate_value, amount, date)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    # Skip elements with errors
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    next
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                rates.empty? ? nil : rates
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

              
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

              # Format 3: Element tags are currency codes
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              def try_tag_as_currency_format(doc, base_currency, date)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                rates = []
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                doc.root.children.each do |elem|
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                  next unless elem.element?
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                  
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    # Use the tag name as currency code
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    currency_code = standardize_currency_code(elem.name)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    rate_value = parse_rate_value(elem.text)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    # Skip invalid codes
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    next if currency_code.empty? || currency_code.length != 3
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    next if rate_value.zero?
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    # Create exchange rate object
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    rates << create_exchange_rate(base_currency, currency_code, rate_value, 1, date)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    # Skip elements with errors
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    next
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                rates.empty? ? nil : rates
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            end 
          
      136.

            class CnbAdapter
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              # Legacy error class for backward compatibility

              class ParseError < StandardError; end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # This static method maintains backward compatibility with old code
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              # It delegates to the appropriate adapter selected via the factory
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              # @param data [String] Raw data to parse
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              # @param base_currency_code [String] Base currency code
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              # @return [Array<ExchangeRate>] Array of exchange rate objects
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              def self.parse(data, base_currency_code)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                begin
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  # Use the adapter factory to select the appropriate adapter
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  adapter = AdapterFactory.for_content('CNB', data)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  adapter.parse(data, base_currency_code)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                rescue ExchangeRateErrors::Error => e
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # Convert new error format to legacy CnbAdapter::ParseError for backward compatibility
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  raise ParseError, e.message
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  # Convert any other errors to ParseError with a message
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  raise ParseError, "Error parsing CNB data: #{e.message}"
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            end 
          
      29.

                    # CNB JSON format can vary, but typically it's an object with

    42. 
            

            

                    
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    # Extract date - look in common locations

    45.

      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46.

    47. 
            

            

                    # Try different JSON structures based on what CNB might provide

      65.

                class CnbTextAdapter < BaseAdapter
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  # The encoding used by CNB's text feed (ISO-8859-2 / Latin-2)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                  SOURCE_ENCODING = 'ISO-8859-2'
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  
          
      10.

                  def initialize(provider_name = 'CNB')

      13.

                  # Check if this adapter supports the given content type
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  def supports_content_type?(content_type)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    content_type && (content_type.downcase.include?('text/plain') || 
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                                     content_type.downcase.include?('text/csv') ||
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                                     content_type.downcase.include?('text/txt'))
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  # Check if this adapter supports the given content
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  def supports_content?(content)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    return false unless content
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    content = content.to_s
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    # Check for characteristic patterns in CNB text data (e.g. pipe delimited)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    has_pipes = content.include?('|')
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    has_currency_codes = content =~ /[A-Z]{3}/
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    has_pipes && has_currency_codes
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  # Parse CNB text feed format
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # @param data [String] Raw text data from CNB
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  # @param base_currency_code [String] Base currency code (e.g., 'CZK')
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  # @return [Array<ExchangeRate>] Array of exchange rate domain objects
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  def perform_parse(data, base_currency_code)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    # Handle encoding - CNB uses ISO-8859-2
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    data = ensure_utf8_encoding(data, SOURCE_ENCODING)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    lines = data.split("\n")
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    raise ExchangeRateErrors::ParseError.new("Empty data from CNB feed", nil, @provider_name) if lines.empty?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    # First line contains date and order number (e.g., "26.03.2025 #60")
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    header_line_index = 1
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    if lines.size <= header_line_index
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                      raise ExchangeRateErrors::ParseError.new("CNB feed data missing header line", nil, @provider_name)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                    header = lines[header_line_index].strip
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    expected_header = "Country|Currency|Amount|Code|Rate"
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    unless header == expected_header
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                      raise ExchangeRateErrors::ParseError.new("Unexpected header format in CNB feed: '#{header}'", nil, @provider_name)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    # Prepare domain objects
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    rates = []
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    currency_map = {}  # to reuse Currency instances by code
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    base_currency = currency_map[base_currency_code] ||= create_currency(base_currency_code)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    # CNB feed lines format: Country|Currency|Amount|Code|Rate
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    # e.g., "Australia|dollar|1|AUD|14.602" meaning 1 AUD = 14.602 CZK.
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                    lines[(header_line_index + 1)..-1].each do |line|
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                      line = line.strip
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      next if line.empty?  # blank line indicates end of main rates section
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                      
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                      parts = line.split('|')
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                      unless parts.size == 5
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        raise ExchangeRateErrors::ParseError.new("Malformed line in CNB feed: '#{line}'", nil, @provider_name)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      country, currency_name, amount_str, code, rate_str = parts
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      # Parse amount and rate
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                      amount = parse_amount(amount_str, code)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                      rate = parse_rate(rate_str, code)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      # Create domain Currency for this code if not already created
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      currency_obj = currency_map[code] ||= create_currency(code, currency_name)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                      
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      # Create ExchangeRate from base currency to this currency with the normalized rate
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                      rates << create_exchange_rate(base_currency_code, code, rate, amount)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    if rates.empty?
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      raise ExchangeRateErrors::ParseError.new("No exchange rate data found in CNB feed", nil, @provider_name)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    rates
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            end 
          
      92.

                class CnbXmlAdapter < BaseAdapter

                  # CNB XML feed also uses ISO-8859-2

                  SOURCE_ENCODING = 'ISO-8859-2'

                    super(provider_name)

                  # Check if this adapter supports the given content type

                  def supports_content_type?(content_type)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    return false unless content_type
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    content_type.downcase.include?('xml')
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20.

                  # Check if this adapter supports the given content

                  def supports_content?(content)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                    return false unless content
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    content = content.to_s.strip
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    content.start_with?('<?xml') || content.start_with?('<kurzy')
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  
          
      28.
