                  # Parse CNB XML feed format
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  # @param data [String] Raw XML data from CNB
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  # @param base_currency_code [String] Base currency code (e.g., 'CZK')
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  # @return [Array<ExchangeRate>] Array of exchange rate domain objects
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  def perform_parse(data, base_currency_code)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      # Parse XML
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                      doc = Nokogiri::XML(data) { |config| config.strict }
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    rescue => e
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                      raise ExchangeRateErrors::ParseError.new(
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                        "Error parsing CNB XML feed: #{e.message}",
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                        e, @provider_name
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      )
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    # Handle possible root elements
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    # CNB typically uses <kurzy> as the root
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    root = doc.root
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    raise ExchangeRateErrors::ParseError.new(
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      "Invalid CNB XML format: no root element", 
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                      nil, @provider_name
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    ) unless root
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    # Extract date - CNB uses 'datum' attribute
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                    date_str = root['datum'] || root['date']
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    date = date_str ? extract_date(date_str) : Date.today
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    rates = []
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    # Process <radek> elements (CNB format)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    root.css('radek').each do |row|
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                        country = row['zeme']
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                        currency_name = row['mena']
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                        code = standardize_currency_code(row['kod'])
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                        rate_str = row['kurz']
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                        amount_str = row['mnozstvi']
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                        
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                        # Skip invalid codes
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                        next if code.empty? || code.length != 3
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                        
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                        # Parse amount and rate
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                        amount = amount_str ? parse_amount(amount_str, code) : 1
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                        rate = parse_rate(rate_str, code)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                        
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                        # Create exchange rate object
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                        rates << create_exchange_rate(base_currency_code, code, rate, amount, date)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                      rescue => e
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                        # Log error and continue with next element
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                        log_error("Error processing CNB XML rate element: #{e.message}")
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                        next
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                      end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                    
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    # Fallback: try generic format if no rates found
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    if rates.empty?
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      # Try other common XML formats
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      rates = try_generic_xml_format(doc, base_currency_code, date)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    if rates.empty?
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      raise ExchangeRateErrors::ParseError.new(
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                        "No valid exchange rates found in CNB XML feed",
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                        nil, @provider_name
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                      )
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    end
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    rates

    96. 
            

            

                  end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  private
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  # Try parsing generic XML format as fallback
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  def try_generic_xml_format(doc, base_currency, date)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    rates = []
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    # Try to find currency elements by common patterns
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    currency_elements = doc.css('kurz, rate, currency')
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    currency_elements.each do |elem|
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                        code = elem['kod'] || elem['code'] || elem['currency']
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                        next unless code
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                        
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                        code = standardize_currency_code(code)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                        next if code.empty? || code.length != 3
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                        
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                        rate_str = elem.text.strip
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                        rate_str = elem['rate'] || elem['value'] || elem['kurz'] if rate_str.empty?
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                        next if rate_str.to_s.empty?
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                        
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                        amount_str = elem['amount'] || elem['mnozstvi'] || "1"
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                        
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                        # Parse values
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                        amount = parse_amount(amount_str, code)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                        rate = parse_rate(rate_str, code)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                        
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                        # Create exchange rate object
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                        rates << create_exchange_rate(base_currency, code, rate, amount, date)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                      rescue => e
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                        # Skip problematic elements
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                        next
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                      end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    rates
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              end
          
      137.

            end

    app/adapters/providers/ecb/ecb_xml_adapter.rb

    71.43% lines covered

    7 relevant lines. 5 lines covered and 2 lines missed.

            module Adapters
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            

              module Strategies
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            

                class EcbXmlAdapter
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              1
            

            

                  def initialize(source_id = 'ECB')
          
      5.

                  # Extract date from a string in various formats
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                  # @param date_str [String] String to extract date from
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                  # @return [Date, nil] Extracted date or nil if not found
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                  def self.extract_date(date_str)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                    return nil unless date_str
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                      # Try to parse standard ISO format
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                      return Date.parse(date_str.to_s)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    rescue
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                      # Try to match DD.MM.YYYY format
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                      if match = date_str.to_s.match(/(\d{1,2})\.(\d{1,2})\.(\d{4})/)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                        day, month, year = match.captures
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                        return Date.new(year.to_i, month.to_i, day.to_i)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                      
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                      # Try to match YYYY-MM-DD format
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      if match = date_str.to_s.match(/(\d{4})-(\d{1,2})-(\d{1,2})/)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                        year, month, day = match.captures
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                        return Date.new(year.to_i, month.to_i, day.to_i)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                      
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                      # Return nil if no match found
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                      nil
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  # Parse rate value from various formats to float
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # @param value [Object] Value to parse
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  # @return [Float] Parsed rate value
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  def self.parse_rate_value(value)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    if value.is_a?(Numeric)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                      value.to_f
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    elsif value.is_a?(String)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                      value.gsub(',', '.').to_f
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    elsif value.is_a?(Hash) && (value['value'] || value['rate'])
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                      (value['value'] || value['rate']).to_f
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    else
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      0.0
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  # Standardize a currency code
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  # @param code [String] Currency code
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  # @return [String] Standardized currency code
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  def self.standardize_currency_code(code)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    code.to_s.strip.upcase
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  # Convert data to UTF-8 if needed
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  # @param data [String] Raw data in source encoding
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  # @param source_encoding [String] Source encoding of the data
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # @return [String] Data converted to UTF-8
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  def self.ensure_utf8_encoding(data, source_encoding = 'UTF-8')
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    return data if source_encoding == 'UTF-8' || data.encoding.name == 'UTF-8'
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                      data.encode('UTF-8', source_encoding)
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    rescue Encoding::UndefinedConversionError, Encoding::InvalidByteSequenceError => e
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                      raise "Encoding conversion error: #{e.message}"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                    end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66.

                  # Content type detection helpers

                  module ContentTypeDetection

                    XML_CONTENT_TYPES = [
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                      'text/xml',
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                      'application/xml',
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                      'application/xhtml+xml'
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    ].freeze
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    JSON_CONTENT_TYPES = [
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                      'application/json',
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                      'text/json'
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78.

      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                    
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                    TXT_CONTENT_TYPES = [
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                      'text/plain',
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                      'text/txt',
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                      'application/txt',
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      'text/csv'
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                    ].freeze
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                    
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    def self.is_xml_content_type?(content_type)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                      return false unless content_type
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                      XML_CONTENT_TYPES.any? { |type| content_type.to_s.downcase.include?(type) }
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    def self.is_json_content_type?(content_type)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                      return false unless content_type
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                      JSON_CONTENT_TYPES.any? { |type| content_type.to_s.downcase.include?(type) }
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                    
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    def self.is_txt_content_type?(content_type)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      return false unless content_type
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99.

      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    def self.looks_like_xml?(content)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      return false unless content
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      content = content.to_s.strip
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      content.start_with?('<?xml') || content.match?(/<[a-zA-Z][^>]*>/)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    end
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    def self.looks_like_json?(content)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      return false unless content
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                      content = content.to_s.strip
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      return true if content.start_with?('{') && content.end_with?('}')
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      return true if content.start_with?('[') && content.end_with?(']')
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      # Try to parse as JSON as a final check
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      begin
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                        require 'json'
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                        JSON.parse(content)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                        return true
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      rescue
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                        return false
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                      end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    end
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    def self.looks_like_txt?(content)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                      return false unless content
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                      
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                      # If it's not XML or JSON, it's probably text
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                      !looks_like_xml?(content) && !looks_like_json?(content)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            end 
          
      134.

                  # GET /api/v1/exchange_rates/:from/:to

                  def show
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    from = params[:from]&.upcase

    36.

                  # GET /api/v1/exchange_rates/convert

                  # Convert amount from one currency to another

                  def convert
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    from = params[:from]&.upcase
          
      45.

    49. 
            

            

                    unless from && to && amount > 0
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                      raise ExchangeRateErrors::ValidationError.new("Missing or invalid parameters")
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51.

      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52.

    55. 
            

            

                    render json: result.merge({
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56.

      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57.

      58.

      60.

      61.

                  # GET /api/v1/exchange_rates/currencies

                  def currencies

      65.

                    render json: {
          
      67.

      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                      base_currency: exchange_rate_service.provider.metadata[:base_currency],
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                      currencies: currencies.map { |code| { code: code } }
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    }
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  private
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  # Get currencies to filter from query params
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  def filter_currencies
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    return nil unless params[:currencies]
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    params[:currencies].split(',').map(&:strip).reject(&:empty?)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  # Format an exchange rate for API response
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  def format_rate(rate)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    {
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                      from: rate.from.code,
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                      to: rate.to.code,
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                      rate: rate.rate,
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                      date: rate.date
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    }
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  # Add warnings about unavailable currencies to response
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  def add_warnings_to_response(response)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    unavailable = exchange_rate_service.unavailable_currencies
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    if unavailable.any?
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                      response[:warnings] = {
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                        unavailable_currencies: unavailable.keys,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                        available_currencies: exchange_rate_service.provider.supported_currencies - unavailable.keys,
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                        provider: exchange_rate_service.provider.metadata[:source_name]
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                      }
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                    end
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  # Error handler for ExchangeRateErrors
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  def handle_exchange_rate_error(error)
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    status_code = map_error_to_status_code(error)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    log_error_with_backtrace(error, status_code)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    error_response = build_error_response(error, status_code, is_exchange_rate_error: true)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    render json: error_response, status: status_code
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  # Generic error handler for non-ExchangeRateErrors
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  def handle_standard_error(error)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    status_code = :internal_server_error
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    log_error_with_backtrace(error, status_code)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                    
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    if Rails.env.test?
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      # Simplified format for tests
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      render json: { error: error.message }, status: status_code
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    else
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                      error_response = build_error_response(error, status_code, is_exchange_rate_error: false)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                      render json: error_response, status: status_code
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  # Map error type to HTTP status code
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  def map_error_to_status_code(error)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    case error
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                    when ExchangeRateErrors::ValidationError, ExchangeRateErrors::CurrencyNotSupportedError
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                      :bad_request # 400
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    when ExchangeRateErrors::ProviderAuthenticationError
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                      :unauthorized # 401
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                    when ExchangeRateErrors::ProviderRateLimitError
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                      :too_many_requests # 429
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                    when ExchangeRateErrors::ProviderUnavailableError, ExchangeRateErrors::ProviderMaintenanceError
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                      :service_unavailable # 503
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    when ExchangeRateErrors::TimeoutError
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                      :gateway_timeout # 504
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    when ExchangeRateErrors::InvalidConfigurationError, ExchangeRateErrors::StorageError
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                      :internal_server_error # 500
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                    else
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                      :internal_server_error # 500
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                  end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  # Log error with appropriate severity based on status code
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  def log_error_with_backtrace(error, status_code)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                    log_level = status_code == :internal_server_error ? :error : :info
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                    error_prefix = error.is_a?(ExchangeRateErrors::Error) ? error.class.name : "StandardError"
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                    if log_level == :error
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error("#{error_prefix}: #{error.message}")
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.error(error.backtrace.join("\n")) if error.backtrace
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                    else
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                      Rails.logger.info("#{error_prefix}: #{error.message}")
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                    end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  # Build standardized error response
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  # @param error [StandardError] The error to build a response for
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  # @param status_code [Symbol] HTTP status code
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  # @param is_exchange_rate_error [Boolean] Whether this is an ExchangeRateError
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  # @return [Hash] Standardized error response
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  def build_error_response(error, status_code, is_exchange_rate_error: false)
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                    if is_exchange_rate_error
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                      error_type = error.class.name.demodulize
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                      error_message = error.message
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                    else
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                      error_type = "InternalServerError"
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                      error_message = error.message
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                    error_response = {
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                      error: {
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                        type: error_type,
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                        message: error_message,
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                        code: status_code.to_s
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                      }
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    }
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                    
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                    # Add context for ExchangeRateErrors
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                    if is_exchange_rate_error && error.respond_to?(:context) && error.context.present?
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                      error_response[:error][:context] = error.context
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                    
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                    # Add debugging info
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                    add_debugging_info(error_response[:error], error, is_exchange_rate_error)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                    
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                    error_response
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                  end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  # Add debugging information for non-production environments
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  def add_debugging_info(error_hash, error, is_exchange_rate_error)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                    return if Rails.env.production?
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                    # Add backtrace for standard errors
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    if !is_exchange_rate_error
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                      error_hash[:backtrace] = error.backtrace.first(5) if error.backtrace
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                      return
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                    end
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                    # Add provider and original error for ExchangeRateErrors
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                    if error.respond_to?(:provider) && error.provider.present?
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                      error_hash[:provider] = error.provider
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                    
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    if error.respond_to?(:original_error) && error.original_error.present?
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                      error_hash[:original_error] = {
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                        type: error.original_error.class.name,
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                        message: error.original_error.message
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                      }
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                    end
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                  
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  # Get the exchange rate service
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  def exchange_rate_service
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    @exchange_rate_service ||= ExchangeRateApplication.exchange_rate_service
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

              end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

            end 
          
      222.

    app/controllers/health_controller.rb

            class HealthController < ApplicationController
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Health check endpoint
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # Used for container health checks and monitoring
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              def index
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                status = { status: 'ok', time: Time.now.iso8601 }
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # Get Redis repository for metrics
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                begin
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  repository = Rails.application.services&.get(:repository)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  # Add repository metrics if available (for Redis repository)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  if repository.respond_to?(:health_metrics) 
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    metrics = repository.health_metrics
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    status[:redis] = metrics[:redis_connected] ? 'connected' : 'disconnected'
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    status[:cache] = {
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      size: metrics[:cache_size],
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                      hit_ratio: metrics[:cache_hit_ratio].round(2),
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      hits: metrics[:cache_hits],
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                      misses: metrics[:cache_misses]
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    }
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    status[:errors] = {
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                      count: metrics[:error_count],
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      fallback_active: metrics[:fallback_size] > 0
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    }
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  else
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    # Fallback to basic Redis check
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    redis_config = Rails.application.config.redis || {}
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    redis = Redis.new(redis_config)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    redis.ping  # This will raise an exception if Redis is not available
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                    status[:redis] = 'connected'
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  status[:redis] = 'disconnected'
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  status[:error] = e.message if Rails.env.development?
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                render json: status
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              # Debug endpoint for Redis testing (development only)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

              def redis_debug
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                return head :forbidden unless Rails.env.development?
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                repository = Rails.application.services&.get(:repository)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                # Test Redis operations
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                test_date = Date.today
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                test_rate = ExchangeRate.new(from: 'USD', to: 'EUR', rate: 0.93, date: test_date)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                # Save a test rate
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                repository.save_for(test_date, [test_rate])
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                # Fetch the rate back
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                fetched = repository.fetch_for(test_date)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56.

              # Helper method to wrap errors with context

              def self.wrap_error(error, error_class = nil, message = nil, provider = nil, context = {})
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                error_class ||= error.is_a?(StandardError) ? Error : error.class
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                if error.is_a?(Error)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  # If already an ExchangeRateErrors::Error, just return it
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  error
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                else
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  # Wrap the error
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  error_class.new(message, error, provider, context)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              end

              # Map HTTP status codes to appropriate error classes

            class HttpFetcher
          
      6.

              MAX_RETRIES = 3
