              # Fetch exchange rates for a specific date
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              # @param date [Date] The date for which to fetch rates
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              # @param allow_stale [Boolean] Whether to allow stale data
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              # @return [Array<ExchangeRate>, nil] Array of exchange rates or nil if not found
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              def fetch_for(date, allow_stale: false)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                result = nil
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                with_redis_error_handling do
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  data = with_redis { |redis| redis.get(key_for(date)) }
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  if data
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                    @cache_hits += 1
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    result = deserialize_rates(data)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    # Store in fallback cache for resilience
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    @fallback_cache[date] = result
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    return result
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # Fallback to in-memory cache if Redis failed or data not found
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                if @fallback_cache[date]
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  @cache_hits += 1
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  return @fallback_cache[date]
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                @cache_misses += 1
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                nil
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              # Save exchange rates for a specific date
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              # @param date [Date] The date for which to save rates
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              # @param rates [Array<ExchangeRate>] The exchange rates to save
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              # @return [Array<ExchangeRate>] The saved exchange rates
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              def save_for(date, rates)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                serialized_data = serialize_rates(rates)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                metadata = { cached_at: Time.now.to_s }
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                with_redis_error_handling do
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  with_redis do |redis|
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                    # Store rates data
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                    redis.setex(key_for(date), @ttl, serialized_data)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                    
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    # Store metadata
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    redis.setex(metadata_key_for(date), @ttl, metadata.to_json)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                # Always update fallback cache
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                @fallback_cache[date] = rates
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                @fallback_metadata[date] = metadata
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                rates
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              # Get caching metadata for a specific date
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              # @param date [Date] The date to get metadata for
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash, nil] Metadata hash or nil if not available
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

              def metadata_for(date)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                with_redis_error_handling do
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  data = with_redis { |redis| redis.get(metadata_key_for(date)) }
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  return JSON.parse(data, symbolize_names: true) if data
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                # Fallback to in-memory cache
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                @fallback_metadata[date]
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              # Get the time when data for a specific date was last cached
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              # @param date [Date] The date to check
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              # @return [Time, nil] Cache time or nil if not cached
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              def cache_time_for(date)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                meta = metadata_for(date)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                meta && Time.parse(meta[:cached_at])
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

              # Clear cached data for a specific date
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

              # @param date [Date] The date to clear
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

              def clear(date)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                with_redis_error_handling do
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  with_redis { |redis| redis.del(key_for(date), metadata_key_for(date)) }
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                # Always clear fallback cache
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                @fallback_cache.delete(date)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                @fallback_metadata.delete(date)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              # Clear all cached data
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              def clear_all
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                with_redis_error_handling do
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  with_redis do |redis|
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    keys = redis.keys("#{@prefix}:*")
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    redis.del(*keys) unless keys.empty?
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122.

      123.

                end
          
      124.

                # Always clear fallback cache

              # Check if data exists for a specific date
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              # @param date [Date] The date to check
          
      132.

              # @return [Boolean] Whether data exists for the date
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

              def has_data_for?(date)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                with_redis_error_handling do
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  return with_redis { |redis| redis.exists?(key_for(date)) }
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                # Fallback to in-memory cache if Redis failed
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                @fallback_cache.key?(date)

    140. 
            

            

              end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              # Get all cached dates
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

              # @return [Array<Date>] Array of dates for which data is cached
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              def cached_dates
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                with_redis_error_handling do
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                  keys = with_redis { |redis| redis.keys("#{@prefix}:rates:*") }
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  return keys.map { |key| extract_date_from_key(key) }.compact
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                # Fallback to in-memory cache if Redis failed
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                @fallback_cache.keys
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

              end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

              # Health metrics for monitoring
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

              # @return [Hash] Hash of health metrics
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

              def health_metrics
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                cache_total = @cache_hits + @cache_misses
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                hit_ratio = cache_total > 0 ? (@cache_hits.to_f / cache_total) : 0
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                {
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  redis_connected: redis_connected?,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  cache_size: cached_dates.size,
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  cache_hit_ratio: hit_ratio,
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  cache_hits: @cache_hits,
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  cache_misses: @cache_misses,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  error_count: @errors,
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                  fallback_size: @fallback_cache.size
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                }
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

              
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

              # Check if Redis is connected
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

              # @return [Boolean] Whether Redis is connected
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

              def redis_connected?
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                with_redis_error_handling(return_on_error: false) do
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  with_redis { |redis| redis.ping == "PONG" }
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                end
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

              end
          
      178.

              private
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              
          
      181.

              # Execute a block with Redis error handling
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

              # @param return_on_error [Boolean] What to return if an error occurs
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              # @yield Block to execute
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              # @return [Object, nil] Result of the block or nil if an error occurred
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

              def with_redis_error_handling(return_on_error: nil)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                yield
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              rescue Redis::BaseError, Redis::CannotConnectError, ConnectionPool::TimeoutError => e
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                @errors += 1
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                log_redis_error(e)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                return_on_error
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              # Log Redis errors with context
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

              # @param error [Exception] Error to log
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              def log_redis_error(error)
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error("Redis error in #{self.class.name}: #{error.class} - #{error.message}")
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error(error.backtrace.join("\n")) if Rails.env.development?
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              # Execute a block with a Redis connection
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              # @yield [Redis] Redis connection
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

              # @return [Object] Result of the block
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              def with_redis
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                if @redis.is_a?(ConnectionPool)
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  @redis.with { |conn| yield conn }
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                else
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                  yield @redis
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

              end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

              # Create a new Redis client pool
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

              # @param pool_size [Integer] Size of the connection pool
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              # @return [ConnectionPool] Redis connection pool
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

              def create_redis_pool(pool_size)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                redis_config = Rails.application.config.redis || {}
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                ConnectionPool.new(size: pool_size, timeout: DEFAULT_TIMEOUT) do
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                  Redis.new(
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    host: redis_config[:host] || ENV['REDIS_HOST'] || 'localhost',
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                    port: redis_config[:port] || ENV['REDIS_PORT'] || 6379,
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                    db: redis_config[:db] || ENV['REDIS_DB'] || 0,
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    password: redis_config[:password] || ENV['REDIS_PASSWORD'],
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                    timeout: DEFAULT_TIMEOUT,
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                    reconnect_attempts: 3
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  )
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                end
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

              end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              # Generate a Redis key for a date
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

              # @param date [Date] The date
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              # @return [String] Redis key
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

              def key_for(date)
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                "#{@prefix}:rates:#{date.to_s}"
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

              end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

              # Generate a Redis key for metadata
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              # @param date [Date] The date
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

              # @return [String] Redis metadata key
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

              def metadata_key_for(date)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                "#{@prefix}:metadata:#{date.to_s}"
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

              end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

            
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

              # Extract date from a Redis key
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

              # @param key [String] Redis key
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

              # @return [Date, nil] Extracted date or nil
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

              def extract_date_from_key(key)
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                date_str = key.gsub("#{@prefix}:rates:", '')
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                Date.parse(date_str) rescue nil
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

              end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

            
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

              # Serialize exchange rates for storage
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

              # @param rates [Array<ExchangeRate>] Exchange rates
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

              # @return [String] Serialized data
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

              def serialize_rates(rates)
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                rates_data = rates.map do |rate|
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                  {
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                    from: rate.from.code,
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                    to: rate.to.code,
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                    rate: rate.rate,
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                    date: rate.date.to_s
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  }
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                end
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                MessagePack.pack(rates_data)
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

              end
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

            
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

              # Deserialize exchange rates from storage
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

              # @param data [String] Serialized data
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

              # @return [Array<ExchangeRate>] Exchange rates
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

              def deserialize_rates(data)
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                # Try MessagePack first, fall back to JSON for backward compatibility
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                begin
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  rates_data = MessagePack.unpack(data, symbolize_keys: true)
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                rescue MessagePack::UnpackError
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                  # Attempt to parse as JSON (for backward compatibility)
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  rates_data = JSON.parse(data, symbolize_names: true)
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                rates_data.map do |rate_data|
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  ExchangeRate.new(
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                    from: rate_data[:from],
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                    to: rate_data[:to],
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                    rate: rate_data[:rate],
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                    date: Date.parse(rate_data[:date])
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                  )
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                end
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

              end
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

            end 
          
      289.

    app/services/cache/cache_strategy.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    29 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 29 lines missed.

            require_relative '../../errors/exchange_rate_errors'

    2. 
            

            

            require_relative '../utils/logging_helper'
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            # Base class for cache strategies
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            # Defines the interface for all cache strategies to implement
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            class CacheStrategy
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              include LoggingHelper
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              # Initialize the cache strategy
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # @param provider [BaseProvider] Exchange rate provider
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              # @param repository [ExchangeRateRepository] Repository for cached data
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              def initialize(provider, repository)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                @provider = provider
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                @repository = repository
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

              end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              # Determine the appropriate date to fetch rates for
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              # This is an abstract method that should be implemented by subclasses
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              # @return [Date] The date to fetch rates for
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              def determine_fetch_date
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                raise NotImplementedError, "#{self.class.name} must implement determine_fetch_date"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              # Check if the cached data for a given date is still fresh
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              # This is an abstract method that should be implemented by subclasses
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              # @param fetch_date [Date] The date for which data was fetched
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

              # @return [Boolean] Whether the cached data is still fresh
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              def cache_fresh?(fetch_date)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                raise NotImplementedError, "#{self.class.name} must implement cache_fresh?"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              # Handle cache refreshing logic
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              # @param fetch_date [Date] The date for which to check/refresh cache
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              # @param force_refresh [Boolean] Whether to force a refresh regardless of freshness
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              # @return [Array<ExchangeRate>, nil] Cached rates if fresh, nil if refresh needed
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              def get_cached_rates(fetch_date, force_refresh = false)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                # Get rates from repository
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                rates = @repository.fetch_for(fetch_date)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                # If no rates are cached or a refresh is forced, return nil to trigger a refresh
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                return nil if rates.nil? || force_refresh
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                # Check if the cached data is still fresh
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                if !cache_fresh?(fetch_date)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  # Return nil to trigger a refresh if cache is stale
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                  return nil
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                # Return cached rates if they're fresh
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                rates
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              # Calculate cache TTL based on provider metadata
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              # @return [Integer] Cache TTL in seconds
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              def calculate_cache_ttl
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                raise NotImplementedError, "#{self.class.name} must implement calculate_cache_ttl"
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

              
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              # Handle errors when fetching rates
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              # @param error [StandardError] The error that occurred
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              # @param fetch_date [Date] The date for which we were fetching rates
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              # @return [Array<ExchangeRate>, nil] Fallback rates if available, nil otherwise
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              def handle_fetch_error(error, fetch_date)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                # By default, re-raise the error
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                raise error
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

              end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            end 
          
      68.

    app/services/cache/default_cache_strategy.rb

            require_relative 'cache_strategy'
          
      2.

            require_relative '../../errors/exchange_rate_errors'
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            require_relative '../utils/logging_helper'
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            require_relative '../utils/date_time_helper'
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            # Default implementation of cache strategy
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            # Uses provider metadata to make intelligent caching decisions
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            class DefaultCacheStrategy < CacheStrategy
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              include LoggingHelper
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

              # Determine the appropriate date to fetch rates for
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              # @return [Date] The date to fetch rates for
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              def determine_fetch_date
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # Get provider metadata
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                metadata = @provider.metadata
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                # Use DateTimeHelper to determine fetch date
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                Utils::DateTimeHelper.determine_fetch_date(metadata)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              # Check if the cached data for a given date is still fresh
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              # @param fetch_date [Date] The date for which data was fetched
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

              # @return [Boolean] Whether the cached data is still fresh
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              def cache_fresh?(fetch_date)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Get cache time from repository metadata
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                cache_time = @repository.cache_time_for(fetch_date)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # If we don't have cache time, it's not fresh
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                return false unless cache_time
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                # Calculate TTL based on provider metadata
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                ttl = calculate_cache_ttl
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                # Check if cache is still within TTL
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                Time.now - cache_time < ttl
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

              
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              # Calculate cache TTL based on provider metadata
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

              # @return [Integer] Cache TTL in seconds
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              def calculate_cache_ttl
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                metadata = @provider.metadata
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                # Use default TTL if metadata is missing
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                return 3600 unless metadata
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                frequency = metadata[:update_frequency]
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                case frequency
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                when :realtime, :minute
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  # For realtime or per-minute updates, cache for a very short time (30 seconds)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  30
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                when :hourly
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  # For hourly updates, cache for 15 minutes
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  15 * 60
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                when :daily
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  # For daily updates, calculate time until next publication
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  next_publication = calculate_next_publication
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  if next_publication
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    # Cache until next publication time, plus a little margin (5 minutes)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    [(next_publication - Time.now).to_i, 5 * 60].max
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  else
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                    # If we can't determine next publication, use 1 hour as default
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                    60 * 60
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                else
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  # Default fallback - 1 hour
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  60 * 60
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

              end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              # Handle errors when fetching rates
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              # Overrides base class to add fallback to stale data for certain errors
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              # @param error [StandardError] The error that occurred
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              # @param fetch_date [Date] The date for which we were fetching rates
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              # @return [Array<ExchangeRate>, nil] Fallback rates if available, nil otherwise
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

              def handle_fetch_error(error, fetch_date)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                # If it's a network or temporary error, try to use stale data
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                if error.is_a?(ExchangeRateErrors::NetworkError) ||
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                   error.is_a?(ExchangeRateErrors::ProviderUnavailableError) ||
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                   error.is_a?(ExchangeRateErrors::TimeoutError)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  log_warning("Error fetching rates: #{error.message}. Trying to use stale data...")
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  # Try to get stale data from repository
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  stale_rates = @repository.fetch_for(fetch_date, allow_stale: true)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  if stale_rates
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                    log_warning("Using stale exchange rate data due to error: #{error.message}")
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                    return stale_rates
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                # For other errors, just raise them
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                raise error
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

              
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              private
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

              
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              # Calculate next publication time based on provider metadata
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

              # @return [Time, nil] Next publication time or nil if can't be determined
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

              def calculate_next_publication
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                metadata = @provider.metadata
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                # Can't calculate without metadata
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                return nil unless metadata
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                frequency = metadata[:update_frequency]
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                publication_time = metadata[:publication_time]
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                # Use DateTimeHelper to calculate next publication
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                Utils::DateTimeHelper.calculate_next_publication(
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  frequency, 
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  publication_time,
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  Time.now
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                )
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            end 
          
      117.

    app/services/core/service_container.rb

            require_relative '../../repositories/redis_exchange_rate_repository'

            class ServiceContainer
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

              def initialize
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @services = {}

    11. 
            

            

                @factories = {}
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                register_defaults
          
      13.

              end
          
      14.

      15.

              # Register a service instance
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

              # @param name [Symbol] Service name
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

              # @param instance [Object] Service instance
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              # @return [Object] The registered instance
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              def register(name, instance)

    20. 
            

            

                @services[name.to_sym] = instance
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              
          
      23.

              # Register a factory method for a service
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              # @param name [Symbol] Service name
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              # @param block [Proc] Factory method
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              def register_factory(name, &block)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                @factories[name.to_sym] = block
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              # Get a service by name
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              # @param name [Symbol] Service name
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

              # @return [Object] Service instance
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              def get(name)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                name = name.to_sym
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # Return the service if it's already created
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                return @services[name] if @services.key?(name)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Create the service if a factory is registered
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                if @factories.key?(name)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  @services[name] = @factories[name].call(self)
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  return @services[name]
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                raise ArgumentError, "No service or factory registered for #{name}"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              
          
      48.

              # Check if a service is registered

              # @param name [Symbol] Service name

              def has?(name)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                name = name.to_sym

      54.
