                # Calculate next publication time based on update frequency
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # @param update_frequency [Symbol] Update frequency (:daily, :hourly, etc.)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # @param publication_time [Time] Base publication time
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                # @param current_time [Time] Current time
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                # @return [Time] Next publication time
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                def self.calculate_next_publication(update_frequency, publication_time, current_time = Time.now)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  return nil unless publication_time
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  case update_frequency
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  when :daily
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    calculate_next_daily_publication(publication_time, current_time)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  when :hourly
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    calculate_next_hourly_publication(publication_time, current_time)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  when :minute
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    current_time + 60 # Simply add one minute
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  else
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    current_time + 3600 # Default to adding one hour
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Calculate next daily publication time
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                # @param publication_time [Time] Base publication time
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                # @param current_time [Time] Current time
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # @return [Time] Next publication time
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                def self.calculate_next_daily_publication(publication_time, current_time)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  publ_hour = publication_time.hour
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  publ_min = publication_time.min
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  publ_tz = publication_time.strftime('%:z')
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  # Create publication time for today
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  today_pub = create_time_with_components(
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    current_time.year, current_time.month, current_time.day,
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    publ_hour, publ_min, 0, publ_tz
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  )
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  if current_time < today_pub
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    # Today's publication hasn't happened yet
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                    today_pub
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  else
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    # Today's publication has passed, get next day's
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                    next_day = current_time + 86400 # add 1 day in seconds
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                    next_day_pub = create_time_with_components(
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                      next_day.year, next_day.month, next_day.day,
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                      publ_hour, publ_min, 0, publ_tz
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                    )
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                    
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    next_day_pub
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                # Adjust time for working days if needed
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                # @param time [Time] The time to adjust
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                # @param working_days_only [Boolean] Whether to adjust for weekends
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                # @return [Time] Adjusted time
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                def self.adjust_for_working_days(time, working_days_only = true)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  working_days_only ? next_business_day(time, working_days_only) : time
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                # Calculate next hourly publication time
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                # @param publication_time [Time] Base publication time with minutes
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                # @param current_time [Time] Current time
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                # @return [Time] Next hourly publication time
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                def self.calculate_next_hourly_publication(publication_time, current_time)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  hour = current_time.hour
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  next_hour = (hour + 1) % 24
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  # Handle day boundary
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  day_offset = next_hour < hour ? 1 : 0
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                  next_day = current_time + (day_offset * 86400)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  # Create publication time for next hour
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  create_time_with_components(
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    next_day.year, next_day.month, next_day.day,
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                    next_hour, publication_time.min, 0, publication_time.strftime('%:z')
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  )
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                # Get the next business day, skipping weekends if necessary
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                # @param time [Time, Date] The base time
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                # @param working_days_only [Boolean] Whether to adjust for weekends
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                # @return [Time, Date] The adjusted time
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                def self.next_business_day(time, working_days_only = true)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  return time unless working_days_only
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  # Handle Date objects specifically
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  if time.is_a?(Date)
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    date = time
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    # Skip weekends
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    date = date + 2 if date.saturday? # Saturday to Monday
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                    date = date + 1 if date.sunday?   # Sunday to Monday
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    return date
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  # Get day of week (0 = Sunday, 6 = Saturday)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  wday = time.wday
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  case wday
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  when 0 # Sunday - move to Monday (+1 day)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    create_time_with_components(
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      time.year, time.month, time.day + 1,
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      time.hour, time.min, time.sec, time.strftime('%:z')
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                    )
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  when 6 # Saturday - move to Monday (+2 days)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    # Ensure we're moving to Monday of next week, not skipping to next week
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    next_day = time + (2 * 86400) # add 2 days
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                    # If this puts us in a different month or causes other date issues,
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                    # manually construct the date to ensure we get the right Monday
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                    if next_day.day < time.day # We crossed a month boundary
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      # For Saturday, we want the Monday that is 2 days ahead (not the next week)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      create_time_with_components(
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                        time.year, time.month, time.day + 2,
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                        time.hour, time.min, time.sec, time.strftime('%:z')
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                      )
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    else
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                      next_day
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                    end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  else
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    time # Weekday, no adjustment needed
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  end
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                # Get the previous business day, skipping weekends if necessary
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                # @param date [Date] The base date
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                # @param working_days_only [Boolean] Whether to adjust for weekends
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                # @return [Date] The previous business day
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                def self.previous_business_day(date, working_days_only = true)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                  return date - 1 unless working_days_only
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  prev_date = date - 1
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  # Skip weekends
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  prev_date -= 2 if prev_date.sunday?
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  prev_date -= 1 if prev_date.saturday?
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  prev_date
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                # Helper method to create a Time object with the given components
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                # @param year [Integer] Year
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                # @param month [Integer] Month
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                # @param day [Integer] Day
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                # @param hour [Integer] Hour
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                # @param min [Integer] Minute
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                # @param sec [Integer] Second
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                # @param timezone [String] Timezone offset string
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                # @return [Time] Time object with the given components
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                def self.create_time_with_components(year, month, day, hour, min, sec, timezone)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  Time.new(year, month, day, hour, min, sec, timezone)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                # Create a Time object for publication on a given date
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                # @param date [Date] The date
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                # @param hour [Integer] Hour
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                # @param minute [Integer] Minute
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                # @param timezone [String] Timezone
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                # @return [Time] Time object for the publication
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                def self.publication_time_for_date(date, hour, minute, timezone)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  Time.new(date.year, date.month, date.day, hour, minute, 0, timezone)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                # Calculate cache TTL until next publication
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                # @param update_frequency [Symbol] Update frequency
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                # @param publication_time [Time] Publication time
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                # @param current_time [Time] Current time
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                # @param default_ttl [Integer] Default TTL if calculation fails
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                # @return [Integer] TTL in seconds
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                def self.calculate_ttl_until_next_publication(update_frequency, publication_time, current_time = Time.now, default_ttl = 3600)
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  next_pub = calculate_next_publication(update_frequency, publication_time, current_time)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  # If next publication time exists, use time until then (min 60 seconds)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  # Otherwise fall back to default
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  next_pub ? [(next_pub - current_time).to_i, 60].max : default_ttl
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                # Get default TTL values by update frequency
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                # @return [Hash] Default TTL values in seconds
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                def self.get_default_ttls
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  {
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                    realtime: 30,     # 30 seconds
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                    minute: 30,       # 30 seconds
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                    hourly: 15 * 60,  # 15 minutes
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                    daily: 3600       # 1 hour (default if publication time not available)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  }
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                end
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                # Determine the appropriate date to fetch rates for based on metadata
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                # @param metadata [Hash] Provider metadata
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                # @return [Date] The date to fetch rates for
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                def self.determine_fetch_date(metadata)
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  today = Date.today
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  now = Time.now
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  # Use default logic if metadata is missing
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  return today unless metadata
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                  update_frequency = metadata[:update_frequency]
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  publication_time = metadata[:publication_time]
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                  working_days_only = metadata[:working_days_only]
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                  
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                  # For update frequencies more frequent than daily, we always use today's date
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                  # as the repository will handle data versioning based on date+time
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  unless update_frequency == :daily
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                    return today
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                  
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                  # For daily updates, check if today's data should be available yet
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  if publication_time
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                    # If current time is before today's publication time, use previous business day
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                    if now < publication_time
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                      # Go to previous day (and if working days only, ensure it's a working day)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                      previous_date = previous_business_day(today, working_days_only)
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                      
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                      return previous_date
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  end
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                  # Default: use today's date
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  today
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

              end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

            end 
          
      226.

    app/services/utils/format_helper.rb

            module Utils
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Helper for consistent formatting and parsing operations
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # Centralizes common data formatting functions
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              module FormatHelper
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

                # Extract date from a string in various formats
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                # @param date_str [String] String to extract date from
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                # @return [Date, nil] Extracted date or nil if not found
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                def self.extract_date(date_str)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                  return nil unless date_str
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    # Try to parse standard ISO format
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    return Date.parse(date_str.to_s)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                  rescue
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    # Try to match DD.MM.YYYY format
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    if match = date_str.to_s.match(/(\d{1,2})\.(\d{1,2})\.(\d{4})/)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                      day, month, year = match.captures
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      return Date.new(year.to_i, month.to_i, day.to_i)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    # Try to match YYYY-MM-DD format
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    if match = date_str.to_s.match(/(\d{4})-(\d{1,2})-(\d{1,2})/)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                      year, month, day = match.captures
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                      return Date.new(year.to_i, month.to_i, day.to_i)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                    
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    # Return nil if no match found
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    nil
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # Parse rate value from various formats to float
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                # @param value [Object] Value to parse
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                # @return [Float] Parsed rate value
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                def self.parse_rate_value(value)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  if value.is_a?(Numeric)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    value.to_f
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  elsif value.is_a?(String)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    value.gsub(',', '.').to_f
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  elsif value.is_a?(Hash) && (value['value'] || value['rate'])
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    (value['value'] || value['rate']).to_f
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  else
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                    0.0
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                # Standardize a currency code
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                # @param code [String] Currency code
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                # @return [String] Standardized currency code
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                def self.standardize_currency_code(code)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  code.to_s.strip.upcase
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                # Parse amount value from either dedicated field or use default
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                # @param amount_str [String, nil] Amount string
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                # @param currency_code [String] Currency code (for context)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                # @return [Integer] Amount value (default: 1)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                def self.parse_amount(amount_str, currency_code = nil)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  return 1 unless amount_str
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  # Extract numeric value
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  amount = amount_str.to_s.strip
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  # Handle special case for Japanese Yen and similar
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  if currency_code && ['JPY', 'IDR'].include?(currency_code.to_s.upcase)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                    # These currencies often use 100 units as base in exchange rates
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                    return amount.empty? ? 100 : amount.to_i
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  # Default
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  amount.empty? ? 1 : amount.to_i
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                # Convert data to UTF-8 if needed
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                # @param data [String] Raw data in source encoding
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                # @param source_encoding [String] Source encoding of the data
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                # @return [String] Data converted to UTF-8
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                def self.ensure_utf8_encoding(data, source_encoding = 'UTF-8')
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  return data if source_encoding == 'UTF-8' || data.encoding.name == 'UTF-8'
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                    data.encode('UTF-8', source_encoding)
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  rescue Encoding::UndefinedConversionError, Encoding::InvalidByteSequenceError => e
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    raise "Encoding conversion error: #{e.message}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                # Content type detection helpers
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                module ContentTypeDetection
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                  XML_CONTENT_TYPES = [
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    'text/xml',
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    'application/xml',
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                    'application/xhtml+xml'
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  ].freeze
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  JSON_CONTENT_TYPES = [
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    'application/json',
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                    'text/json'
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  ].freeze
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  TXT_CONTENT_TYPES = [
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                    'text/plain',
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    'text/txt',
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    'application/txt',
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    'text/csv'
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  ].freeze
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  def self.is_xml_content_type?(content_type)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                    return false unless content_type
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                    XML_CONTENT_TYPES.any? { |type| content_type.to_s.downcase.include?(type) }
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                  end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                  
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                  def self.is_json_content_type?(content_type)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                    return false unless content_type
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                    JSON_CONTENT_TYPES.any? { |type| content_type.to_s.downcase.include?(type) }
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  def self.is_txt_content_type?(content_type)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                    return false unless content_type
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                    TXT_CONTENT_TYPES.any? { |type| content_type.to_s.downcase.include?(type) }
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                  end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                  def self.looks_like_xml?(content)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    return false unless content
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                    content = content.to_s.strip
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    content.start_with?('<?xml') || content.match?(/<[a-zA-Z][^>]*>/)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  end
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  def self.looks_like_json?(content)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    return false unless content
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                    content = content.to_s.strip
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    (content.start_with?('{') && content.end_with?('}')) ||
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                      (content.start_with?('[') && content.end_with?(']'))
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                  end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              end
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

            end 
          
      138.

    app/services/utils/logging_helper.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    30 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 30 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            module LoggingHelper
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Log a message with specified severity
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # @param message [String] Message to log
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # @param level [Symbol] Log level (:error, :warn, :info)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # @param prefix [String] Optional prefix for the message
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def log_message(message, level = :error, prefix = nil)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                full_message = prefix ? "#{prefix}: #{message}" : message
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                if defined?(Rails)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  case level
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                  when :warn, :warning
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn(full_message)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  when :info
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info(full_message)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  else
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error(full_message)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                else
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  if level == :info
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    puts(full_message)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  else
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    warn("[#{level.to_s.upcase}] #{full_message}")
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  end

                # Add default provider configurations

                # Provider configuration DSL that simplifies configuration management
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                # @param provider_name [String] The provider name (for error messages)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # @param config [Hash] The provider configuration
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                # @param overrides [Hash] Additional configuration overrides
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                # @return [Hash] The merged configuration with defaults
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                def self.configure(provider_name, config = {}, overrides = {})
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  defaults = PROVIDER_DEFAULTS[provider_name] || {}
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  required_fields = overrides[:required_fields] || defaults[:required_fields] || []
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  # Merge defaults, then apply any overrides
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  result = defaults.merge(config)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  result.merge!(overrides.reject { |k, _| k == :required_fields })
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  # Validate required fields
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  validate_required_fields(provider_name, result, required_fields)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  result
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                # Validate that required configuration fields are present
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                # @param provider_name [String] The provider name (for error messages)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                # @param config [Hash] The provider configuration
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                # @param required_fields [Array<String>] Required field names
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                # @raise [ExchangeRateErrors::InvalidConfigurationError] If required fields are missing
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                def self.validate_required_fields(provider_name, config, required_fields)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  missing_fields = required_fields.select { |field| config[field].nil? }
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  if missing_fields.any?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    raise ExchangeRateErrors::InvalidConfigurationError.new(
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                      "#{provider_name} requires these configuration fields: #{missing_fields.join(', ')}",
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                      nil, provider_name
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                    )
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58.

                  # Extract provider name without 'Provider' suffix

                  def provider_name_without_suffix(provider)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                    if provider.is_a?(String)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                      provider.gsub('Provider', '')
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                    else
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                      provider.class.name.gsub('Provider', '')
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                    end

                  # Validate that a currency code is valid
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  # @param code [String] Currency code to validate
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  # @raise [ExchangeRateErrors::ValidationError] If currency code is invalid
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  def validate_currency(code)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    begin
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                      CurrencyHelper.validate_code(code)
